column4: which lightweight web-browser do you guys recommend? i've tried epiphany, midori, and konqueror.. (but i want gnome/gtk)
What's wrong with the browsers you've tried?
If none of those work for you, I'd say check out dillo. It's less fully featured, but it's still x11 blazing fast.
I ocasionally use dillo when I really need to be fast, and have something that's too much of a pain to use w3m or something likewise
